subject: Re: Thank you for your refinance debt request, we are accepting your refinance appication
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this deal will expire TODAY):
$214,000+ debt
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this short form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://doabcoacking.com/
